name: Promenade
short_description: The world's first windows app store that works on a simple concept.  When you launch, you auto-download our repo-files. Find the app you want and click more info. Click open DLM. Paste the link. Start downloading ASAP! Everything is in one .exe file - and that's it. Truly portable.
